name: CONTRA (itch)
description:
The playable version of the CONTRA game being developed with G Develop.

Tutorial series to develop a Contra's like game with GDevelop

The tutorial series can be found on youtube https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiyuZHAJlUir3DO5u0FkKhV449llDDSMH

And on our website

http://www.game-developers.org
